aboutMe.coverLetter: Hey üëã, I'm Mohd Danish and I'm 26y old Front-end Engineer, I make MVP in days and I also do basic Back-end Development with Node and MongoDB. I have completed my Master in Computer Application From Aligarh Muslim University. The maker of public-apis.xyz, dailyhack.xyz, apiwithgithub.com, react-index.com & Open Source Developer, Tech Writer, Foodie üç≥
